snippet.title: The Legend of DOOM
snippet.description:
The Legend of DOOM is a GZDoom based total conversion that brings the classic world of Hyrule to life in 3D.

The DOOM and Zelda games have been huge sources of influence and inspiration for me personally. Now adays I find the fandoms and creator communities that have grown up with these franchises equally inspiring. I have long held dreams to see this world realized in 3D and to create a DOOM mod. 

Thank you to everyone who contributes to the Zelda and DOOM communities with your code, art, effort, and encouragement.

If you think this is cool and are comfortable to do so, please consider 'buying me a coffee'

https://ko-fi.com/detwelve

✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧ VIDEO CREDITS ✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦

Trailer music by FalKKonE
https://www.falkkone.com
https://youtu.be/c515I9fkoI4

Trailer Editing by DASdrones
https://www.DASdrones.org

✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧ LINKS ✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦✧✦

ZDOOM THREAD
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=73489

MODDB
https://www.moddb.com/mods/legend-of-doom

GZDOOM
https://zdoom.org/downloads

FREEDOOM 
You can use one of these WADs if you don't own DOOM.wad or DOOM2.wad files.
https://freedoom.github.io/download.html

HOWTO RUN DOOM  MOD TUTORIAL
https://youtu.be/34HfmGvUJIM
